boardgame.name: Gangs of Cuba
Mafia de Cuba
教父風雲
boardgame.description: Havana, December 29, 1955: At the end of the meal offered at his _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;faithful_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; henchmen, don Alessandro evokes the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;business_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; in progress. Suddenly, the phone rang in the back room of the restaurant. The Godfather is convened to the office of President Batista. He entrusted his precious cigar box to his henchmen. It must be said that the cigar box has a false bottom, under the first layer of cigars, the box is filled with diamonds!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Mafia de Cuba, each player will take the cigar box, open it and choose to:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Betray and steal some diamonds,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Remain a faithful and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;honest_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; mafioso, be a driver, or act as an undercover CIA agent._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the evening, the Godfather recovers his cigar box. He blows a fuse when he finds the disappearance of diamonds. He must find his treasure and punish offenders by providing them cement shoes before throwing them in the bay. After heated debates and perilous deductions, The Godfather, with the help of is faithful henchmen will try to find all his stolen diamonds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Does he lose his honor by accusing wrongly?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Do the most cunning thieves win?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Or is it the CIA that will send these thugs behind bars?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: New and Sealed Retail copy of Mafia de Cuba £5 shipping in the UK (I combine Shipping, but other items will be held until Mafia de Cuba is in stock) Outside UK? Send me a message for shipping costs Thank You Rob cultofthenew.co.uk
Asmodee Shipping $4 ($3 each additional item (max $18 total), $100 in items ships free)
English printed rules included.
New and Sealed Retail copy of Mafia de Cuba £3 shipping in the UK (I combine Shipping) Outside UK? Send me a message for shipping costs Thank You Rob cultofthenew.co.uk

Asmodee (ASMLMMAF01US) In Mafia de Cuba players take on the roles of henchmen, drivers, thieves and government agents, each trying to take a piece of the pie that the godfather has worked so hard to build. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be up to the head of this crime family to determine who they can trust and who has been sticking their fingers into the pot. Up to 12 gangsters can take part in this tense, hilarious bluffing game. Remembering what loot was left when it gets to you will be key if want to get away with ripping off the Don or you can try to catch him in a sting with an FBI or CIA agent. This game proves there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s no honor among thieves.
Opened and Unplayed. For +$5 I can include the expansion. It is a small box so USPS shipping should be very reasonable.
Game weight: 0.320 kg Dutch Edition.

Shrinkwrapped and in stock Language: Dutch, game itself is totally language independent. I can include English rules if you wish. Within The Netherlands € 4,- per shipment to a Kiala service point near you or € 6,75 per shipment for delivery at your doorstep. Shipment to Belgium by Kiala is € 7,50. Payment is possible by bank transfer or Paypal (costs +3%)
SHIPPING Germany 4,- Euro Europe EU 10,- Euro worldwide 12,- Euro PAYMENT paypal or SEPA
